Lets explore the data set now

```{r}
# Import the data
df <- df.tidy

# Explore
library(ggplot2)
ggplot(df) + aes(type, price, color = type) + 
  geom_jitter() + scale_y_log10()

ggplot(df) + aes(type, price, color = type) + 
  geom_jitter() + scale_y_log10()

ggplot(df) + aes(kmplc, price, color = type) + 
  geom_point() + scale_y_log10()

```
